import React, { useState } from 'react'; export default function login(){ const [form, setForm] = useState({email:"", password:""}); let onSubmit = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() console.log(form) } let onChange = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const {name, value} = e.target setForm({...form,[name]:value}) console.log(e.target.value) } return(
